mainBoard.name: Captivating Vampire
mainBoard.originalText:
Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1.
Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

rulings.text: Since Captivating Vampire’s activated ability doesn’t have a tap symbol in its cost, you can tap a Vampire (including Captivating Vampire itself) that hasn’t been under your control since your most recent turn began to pay the cost.

The effect of Captivating Vampire’s activated ability has no duration. You retain control of the affected creature until the game ends, the creature leaves the battlefield, or a later effect causes someone else to gain control of it. It doesn’t matter whether Captivating Vampire remains on the battlefield. Similarly, the affected creature remains a Vampire in addition to its other types until the game ends, the creature leaves the battlefield, or a later effect changes its types or subtypes.
Gaining control of a creature doesn’t cause you gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.

mainBoard.text:
Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1.
Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.

mainBoard.name: Rise from the Grave
mainBoard.originalText: Put target creature card in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

rulings.text: Rise from the Grave doesn’t overwrite any previous colors or types. Rather, it adds another color and another subtype.
If the creature is normally colorless, it will simply become black. It can’t be both black and colorless.

A later effect that changes the affected creature’s colors will overwrite that part of Rise from the Grave’s effect; the creature will be only the new color. The same is true about an effect that changes the affected creature’s types or subtypes.

mainBoard.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

mainBoard.name: Corrupt
mainBoard.originalText: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

rulings.text: The swamps are counted on resolution.
The life you gain is equal to the damage dealt by Corrupt, not necessarily to the number of Swamps you control (if some or all of the damage is prevented, for example).

The amount of damage dealt to a creature is not bounded by its toughness, and the amount of damage dealt to a player is not bounded by that player’s life total. For example, if Corrupt deals 6 damage to a 2/2 creature, you’ll gain 6 life.
Corrupt counts any land you control with the subtype Swamp, not just ones named Swamp.

mainBoard.text: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

foreignData.name: 帰化
foreignData.text: アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: "A natureza não precisa de adornos." — Garruk Falabravo
foreignData.name: Naturalizar
foreignData.text: Destrua o artefato ou encantamento alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Природе не нужны украшения». — Гаррук Дикоречивый
foreignData.name: Приживание
foreignData.text: Уничтожьте целевой артефакт или чары.

foreignData.flavorText: 「大自然不需装饰品。」 ～召兽使贾路
foreignData.name: 回归自然
foreignData.text: 消灭目标神器或结界。

mainBoard.name: Naturalize
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mainBoard.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mainBoard.flavorText: Simun the Quiet filled the chest with his most precious thoughts. But in a fit of paranoia, he locked up the memory of where he hid the key.

foreignData.flavorText: Simun der Stille füllte die Truhe mit seinen wertvollsten Gedanken. Aber in einem Anfall von Verfolgungswahn packte er auch die Erinnerung daran hinein, wo er den Schlüssel verstecken würde.
foreignData.name: Schatulle des Hexenmeisters
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: Wirf eine Münze. Falls du den Münzwurf gewinnst, opfere die Schatulle des Hexenmeisters und ziehe drei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: Simun el silencioso llenó el cofre con sus pensamientos más valiosos. Pero en un ataque de paranoia, bloqueó el recuerdo de dónde escondió la llave.
foreignData.name: Caja fuerte del hechicero
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: Lanza una moneda a cara o cruz. Si ganas el lanzamiento, sacrifica la caja fuerte del hechicero y roba tres cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: Simun le Silencieux remplit le coffre de ses pensées les plus précieuses. Mais dans une crise de paranoïa, il y enferma aussi le souvenir de l'endroit où il avait rangé la clef.
foreignData.name: Coffre-fort du sorcier
foreignData.text: {2}, {T} : Jouez à pile ou face. Si vous gagnez, sacrifiez le Coffre-fort du sorcier et piochez trois cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: Simun il Taciturno riempì il forziere coi suoi pensieri più preziosi. Ma in uno slancio paranoico, rinchiuse il ricordo di dove aveva nascosto la chiave.
foreignData.name: Forziere dello Stregone
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: Lancia una moneta. Se vinci il lancio, sacrifica il Forziere dello Stregone e pesca tre carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 静寂なるシマンは、自分の最も貴重な思考を櫃に詰め込んだ。 しかし、偏執の発作に駆られて、彼は鍵を隠した場所の記憶に錠をかけてしまった。
foreignData.name: 魔術師の金庫
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}：コイン投げをする。 あなたがコイン投げに勝った場合、魔術師の金庫を生け贄に捧げるとともにカードを３枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: Simun, o Silencioso, encheu o baú com seus pensamentos mais preciosos. Mas num ataque de paranoia, trancou também a memória de onde havia escondido a chave.
foreignData.name: Caixa-forte do Feiticeiro
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: Lance uma moeda. Se você vencer, sacrifique Caixa-forte do Feiticeiro e compre três cards.

foreignData.flavorText: Симун Тихоня запер в сундук свои самые дорогие мысли. Но в приступе паранойи он сунул туда и воспоминание о том, куда он спрятал ключ.
foreignData.name: Сейф Волшебника
foreignData.text: {2}, {T}: подбросьте монету. Если вы выигрываете бросок, пожертвуйте Сейф Волшебника и возьмите три карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 寡言的西牧将自己最珍贵的思绪装满此柜。 但在一次恐慌发作中，他将自己藏钥匙之处的记忆给锁上了。
foreignData.name: 术士保险柜
foreignData.text: {2}，{T}：掷一枚硬币。 若你赢得此掷，则牺牲术士保险柜并抓三张牌。

mainBoard.name: Sorcerer's Strongbox
mainBoard.originalText: {2}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, sacrifice Sorcerer's Strongbox and draw three cards.

rulings.text: If you lose the flip, nothing happens.
If you no longer control Sorcerer’s Strongbox by the time you win the flip, you won’t be able to sacrifice it. You’ll still draw three cards, though.

mainBoard.text: {2}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, sacrifice Sorcerer's Strongbox and draw three cards.

mainBoard.flavorText: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

foreignData.flavorText: Die gefürchteten Gase töteten Farbid nicht. Doch als er hilflos im Schlamm lag und mit ansehen musste, wie Ghule und Ratten immer näher kamen, bedauerte er es.
foreignData.name: Sumpfkrankheit
foreignData.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält -1/-1 für jeden Sumpf, den du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: Los espantosos gases no mataron a Fárbid. Pero mientras estaba hundido en el barro, miserable e indefenso, viendo cómo las ratas y necrófagos se le acercaban, hubiera preferido estar muerto.
foreignData.name: Náuseas del lodazal
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura.
La criatura encantada obtiene -1/-1 por cada pantano que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: Les gaz ne tuèrent pas Farbid. Mais il le regretta amèrement quand, étalé dans la boue, misérable et sans défense, il vit les goules et les rats approcher.
foreignData.name: Mal des bourbiers
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature
La créature enchantée gagne -1/-1 pour chaque marais que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: I gas tanto temuti non uccisero Farbid. Ma immerso nel sudiciume, dolente e inerme, a guardare ghoul e ratti che gli si avvicinavano, desiderò che lo avessero fatto.
foreignData.name: Malattia dell'Acquitrino
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
La creatura incantata prende -1/-1 per ogni Palude che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 恐るべき瘴気はファービッドを殺さなかった。 しかし、ぬかるみに無力なまま横たわり、悪霊や鼠が自分に近づくのを見ながら、彼は殺してくれと願っていた。
foreignData.name: 泥沼病
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、あなたがコントロールする沼１つにつき－１/－１の修整を受ける。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.flavorText: Os gases aterrorizantes não mataram Farbid. Mas enquanto estava estendido na lama, sentindo-se desprezível e impotente e observando os ghouls e as ratazanas que se aproximavam, ele desejou que estivesse morto.
foreignData.name: Enjoo de Lodaçal
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura
A criatura encantada recebe -1/-1 para cada Pântano que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText: Страшные газы не убили Фарбида. Но когда он, жалкий и беспомощный, остался лежать в вонючей жиже, наблюдая подбирающихся к нему упырей и крыс, он сильно об этом пожалел.
foreignData.name: Болотный Недуг
foreignData.text:
Зачаровать существо
Зачарованное существо получает -1/-1 за каждое Болото под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 法比没被可怕的沼气毒死。 但当他痛苦无助地躺在淤泥中，眼睁睁看着食尸鬼与老鼠向他逼近，他希望自己早该给毒死。
foreignData.name: 沼地病症
foreignData.text:
结附于生物
你每操控一个沼泽，所结附的生物便得-1/-1。

mainBoard.name: Quag Sickness
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.

rulings.text: This ability counts the number of Swamps controlled by Quag Sickness’s controller, not the enchanted creature’s controller (in case they’re different players).
This bonus is not fixed; it changes as the number of Swamps you control changes.
The ability cares about lands with the land type Swamp, not necessarily lands named Swamp.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.
